title: The Godfather
simple_desc: Don Vito Corleone, head of a mafia family, decides to hand over his empire to his youngest son Michael. However, his decision unintentionally puts the lives of his loved ones in grave danger.

title: The Dark Knight
simple_desc: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: The Godfather Part II
simple_desc: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

title: 12 Angry Men
simple_desc: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

title: Pulp Fiction
simple_desc: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Jai Bhim
simple_desc: When a tribal man is arrested for a case of alleged theft, his wife turns to a human-rights lawyer to help bring justice.

title: Goodfellas
simple_desc: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

title: The Green Mile
simple_desc: A tale set on death row in a Southern jail, where gentle giant John possesses the mysterious power to heal people's ailments. When the lead guard, Paul, recognizes John's gift, he tries to help stave off the condemned man's execution.

title: Se7en
simple_desc: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
simple_desc: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

title: City of God
simple_desc: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

title: Nayakan
simple_desc: A common man's struggles against a corrupt police force put him on the wrong side of the law. He becomes a don, who is loved and respected by many, but his growing power and influence exact a heavy toll.

title: The Departed
simple_desc: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: Léon: The Professional
simple_desc: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

title: American History X
simple_desc: Living a life marked by violence, neo-Nazi Derek finally goes to prison after killing two black youths. Upon his release, Derek vows to change; he hopes to prevent his brother, Danny, who idolizes Derek, from following in his footsteps.

title: The Usual Suspects
simple_desc: The sole survivor of a pier shoot-out tells the story of how a notorious criminal influenced the events that began with five criminals meeting in a seemingly random police lineup.

title: Joker
simple_desc: The rise of Arthur Fleck, from aspiring stand-up comedian and pariah to Gotham's clown prince and leader of the revolution.

title: Witness for the Prosecution
simple_desc: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

title: Kaithi
simple_desc: Dilli, an ex-convict, endeavours to meet his daughter for the first time after leaving prison. However, his attempts are interrupted due to a drug raid planned by Inspector Bejoy.

title: High and Low
simple_desc: An executive of a Yokohama shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped by mistake and held for ransom.

title: Sardar Udham
simple_desc: A biopic detailing the 2 decades that Punjabi Sikh revolutionary Udham Singh spent planning the assassination of the man responsible for the Jallianwala Bagh massacre.

title: Black Friday
simple_desc: A film about the investigations following the 1993 serial Bombay bomb blasts, told through the different stories of the people involved --police, conspirators, victims, middlemen.

title: Thani Oruvan
simple_desc: Siddharth Abimanyu, an influential scientist, is involved in various illegal medical practices. Mithran, an efficient IPS officer, decides to expose him.

title: Heat
simple_desc: A group of high-end professional thieves start to feel the heat from the LAPD when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

title: Scarface
simple_desc: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

title: A Clockwork Orange
simple_desc: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

title: Once Upon a Time in America
simple_desc: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

title: Reservoir Dogs
simple_desc: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
simple_desc: Atticus Finch, a widowed lawyer in Depression-era Alabama, defends a Black man against an undeserved rape charge, and tries to educate his young children against prejudice.

title: The Sting
simple_desc: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

title: M
simple_desc: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

title: Double Indemnity
simple_desc: A Los Angeles insurance representative lets an alluring housewife seduce him into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, an insurance investigator.

title: Raatchasan
simple_desc: A sub-inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen school girls and murders them brutally.

title: K.G.F: Chapter 2
simple_desc: In the blood-soaked Kolar Gold Fields, Rocky's name strikes fear into his foes. While his allies look up to him, the government sees him as a threat to law and order. Rocky must battle threats from all sides for unchallenged supremacy.

title: The Young and the Damned
simple_desc: A group of juvenile delinquents lives a violent and crime-filled life in the festering slums of Mexico City, and the morals of young Pedro are gradually corrupted and destroyed by the others.

title: Drishyam
simple_desc: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

title: Khosla Ka Ghosla!
simple_desc: A Delhi-based retired middle-class man tries half-heartedly to get his land back from a swindling property dealer with the help of his sons and their friends.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
simple_desc: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: Taxi Driver
simple_desc: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.

title: No Country for Old Men
simple_desc: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

title: Casino
simple_desc: In Las Vegas, two best friends - a mafia enforcer and a casino executive - compete for a gambling empire and a fast-living, fast-loving socialite.

title: Batman Begins
simple_desc: After witnessing his parents' death, Bruce learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: Snatch
simple_desc: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
simple_desc: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

title: L.A. Confidential
simple_desc: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

title: Drishyam 2
simple_desc: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Vijay Salgaonkar be able to protect his family this time?

title: Dial M for Murder
simple_desc: A former tennis star arranges the murder of his adulterous wife.

title: Gangs of Wasseypur
simple_desc: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

title: Vikram Vedha
simple_desc: Vikram, a no-nonsense police officer, accompanied by Simon, his partner, is on the hunt to capture Vedha, a smuggler and a murderer. Vedha tries to change Vikram's life, which leads to a conflict.

title: Andhadhun
simple_desc: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

title: Rashomon
simple_desc: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.

title: Z
simple_desc: The public murder of a prominent politician and doctor amid a violent demonstration is covered up by military and government officials. A tenacious magistrate is determined not to let them get away with it.

title: Drishyam
simple_desc: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

title: Rocco and His Brothers
simple_desc: Having recently been uprooted to Milan, Rocco and his four brothers each look for a new way in life when a prostitute comes between Rocco and his brother Simone.

title: K.G.F: Chapter 1
simple_desc: In the 1970s, a gangster goes undercover as a slave to assassinate the owner of a notorious gold mine.

title: Close-Up
simple_desc: The true story of Hossain Sabzian, a cinephile who impersonated the director Mohsen Makhmalbaf to convince a family they would star in his so-called new film.

title: Paan Singh Tomar
simple_desc: The story of Paan Singh Tomar, an Indian athlete and seven-time national steeplechase champion who becomes one of the most feared dacoits in Chambal Valley after his retirement.

title: Prisoners
simple_desc: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
simple_desc: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

title: The Big Lebowski
simple_desc: Ultimate L.A. slacker Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for a rug ruined by debt collectors, enlisting his bowling buddies for help while trying to find the millionaire's missing wife.

title: Catch Me If You Can
simple_desc: Barely 21 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.

title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
simple_desc: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

title: Fargo
simple_desc: Minnesota car salesman Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

title: Spotlight
simple_desc: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
simple_desc: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

title: Memories of Murder
simple_desc: In a small Korean province in 1986, two detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

title: Cool Hand Luke
simple_desc: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

title: La haine
simple_desc: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

title: On the Waterfront
simple_desc: An ex-prize fighter turned New Jersey longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses, including his older brother, as he starts to connect with the grieving sister of one of the syndicate's victims.

title: In the Name of the Father
simple_desc: A man's coerced confession to an I.R.A. bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

title: Paper Moon
simple_desc: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

title: The 400 Blows
simple_desc: A young boy, left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.

title: Diabolique
simple_desc: The wife and mistress of a loathed school principal plan to murder him with what they believe is the perfect alibi.

title: Talvar
simple_desc: An experienced investigator confronts several conflicting theories about the perpetrators of a violent double homicide.

title: White Heat
simple_desc: A psychopathic criminal with a mother complex makes a daring break from prison and leads his old gang in a chemical plant payroll heist.

title: A Wednesday
simple_desc: A retiring police officer reminisces about the most astounding day of his career. About a case that was never filed but continues to haunt him in his memories - the case of a man and a Wednesday.

title: Time of the Gypsies
simple_desc: In this luminous tale set in the area around Sarajevo and in Italy, Perhan, an engaging young Romany (gypsy) with telekinetic powers, is seduced by the quick-cash world of petty crime, which threatens to destroy him and those he loves.

title: Pink
simple_desc: When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

title: Rang De Basanti
simple_desc: The story of six young Indians who assist an English woman to film a documentary on the freedom fighters from their past, and the events that lead them to relive the long-forgotten saga of freedom.

title: Article 15
simple_desc: In the rural heartlands of India, an upright police officer sets out on a crusade against violent caste-based crimes and discrimination.

title: Rififi
simple_desc: Four men plan a technically perfect crime, but the human element intervenes...

title: Omkara
simple_desc: A politically-minded enforcer's misguided trust in his lieutenant leads him to suspect his wife of infidelity in this adaptation of Shakespeare's 'Othello'.
stars: ['Ajay Devgn', 'Kareena Kapoor', 'Saif Ali Khan', 'Konkona Sen Sharma']

title: The Bandit
simple_desc: Baran the Bandit, released from prison after 35 years, searches for vengeance and his lover.

title: Hera Pheri
simple_desc: Three unemployed men look for answers to all their money problems - but when their opportunity arrives, will they know what to do with it?

title: John Wick: Chapter 4
simple_desc: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

title: Zootopia
simple_desc: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

title: Sin City
simple_desc: An exploration of the dark and miserable Basin City and three of its residents, all of whom are caught up in violent corruption.

title: Out of the Past
simple_desc: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him. Now he must return to the big city world of danger, corruption, double crosses, and duplicitous dames.

title: Dog Day Afternoon
simple_desc: Three amateur bank robbers plan to hold up a bank. A nice simple robbery: Walk in, take the money, and run. Unfortunately, the supposedly uncomplicated heist suddenly becomes a bizarre nightmare as everything that could go wrong does.

title: Slumdog Millionaire
simple_desc: A Mumbai teenager reflects on his life after being accused of cheating on the Indian version of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?".

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
simple_desc: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

title: Perfect Blue
simple_desc: A pop singer gives up her career to become an actress, but she slowly goes insane when she starts being stalked by an obsessed fan and what seems to be a ghost of her past.

title: Dogville
simple_desc: A woman on the run from the mob is reluctantly accepted in a small Colorado community in exchange for labor, but when a search visits the town she finds out that their support has a price.

title: The Invisible Guest
simple_desc: A successful entrepreneur accused of murder and a witness preparation expert have less than three hours to come up with an impregnable defense.

title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
simple_desc: Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. Their solution - escape to Bolivia.

title: Chungking Express
simple_desc: Two melancholy Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal waitress at a late-night restaurant he frequents.

title: The Night of the Hunter
simple_desc: A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid the $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

title: The Maltese Falcon
simple_desc: San Francisco private detective Sam Spade takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar and their quest for a priceless statuette, with the stakes rising after his partner is murdered.

title: Papillon
simple_desc: A French convict in the 1930s befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence in the South American penal colony on Devil's Island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.

title: Infernal Affairs
simple_desc: A story between a mole in the police department and an undercover cop. Their objectives are the same: to find out who is the mole, and who is the cop.
stars: ['Andy Lau', 'Tony Leung Chiu-wai', 'Anthony Chau-Sang Wong', 'Eric Tsang']

title: Kind Hearts and Coronets
simple_desc: A distant poor relative of the Duke D'Ascoyne plots to inherit the title by murdering the eight other heirs who stand ahead of him in the line of succession.

title: Touch of Evil
simple_desc: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping and police corruption in a Mexican border town.

title: Le Samouraï
simple_desc: After professional hitman Jef Costello is seen by witnesses his efforts to provide himself an alibi drive him further into a corner.

title: Elite Squad
simple_desc: In 1997 Rio de Janeiro, Captain Nascimento has to find a substitute for his position while trying to take down drug dealers and criminals before the Pope visits.

title: Haider
simple_desc: A young man returns to Kashmir after his father's disappearance to confront his uncle, whom he suspects of playing a role in his father's fate.

title: Black Cat, White Cat
simple_desc: Matko and his son Zare live on the banks of the Danube river and get by through hustling and basically doing anything to make a living. In order to pay off a business debt Matko agrees to marry off Zare to the sister of a local gangster.

title: Elite Squad 2: The Enemy Within
simple_desc: After a prison riot, former-Captain Nascimento, now a high ranking security officer in Rio de Janeiro, is swept into a bloody political dispute that involves government officials and paramilitary groups.

title: A Short Film About Killing
simple_desc: A soon-to-be lawyer crosses his path with a taxi driver and a young sinister man.

title: Special 26
simple_desc: A gang of con-men rob prominent rich businessmen and politicians by posing as C.B.I and income tax officers.

title: Knives Out
simple_desc: A detective investigates the death of the patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.
stars: ['Daniel Craig', 'Chris Evans', 'Ana de Armas', 'Jamie Lee Curtis']

title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
simple_desc: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

title: True Romance
simple_desc: In Detroit, a lonely pop culture geek marries a call girl, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood. Meanwhile, the owners of the cocaine, the Mob, track them down in an attempt to reclaim it.

title: In Bruges
simple_desc: Guilt-stricken after a job gone wrong, hitman Ray and his partner await orders from their ruthless boss in Bruges, Belgium, the last place in the world Ray wants to be.

title: Mystic River
simple_desc: The lives of three men who were childhood friends are shattered when one of them has a family tragedy.

title: The Big Sleep
simple_desc: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a wealthy family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail and what might be love.

title: The Blues Brothers
simple_desc: Jake Blues rejoins with his brother Elwood after being released from prison, but the duo has just days to reunite their old R&B band and save the Catholic home where the two were raised, outrunning the police as they tear through Chicago.

title: Carlito's Way
simple_desc: A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of N.Y.C.

title: Ghost in the Shell
simple_desc: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

title: Bound by Honor
simple_desc: Based on the true life experiences of poet Jimmy Santiago Baca, the film focuses on step-brothers Paco and Cruz, and their bi-racial cousin Miklo.

title: The Raid 2
simple_desc: Only a short time after the first raid, Rama goes undercover with the thugs of Jakarta and plans to bring down the syndicate and uncover the corruption within his police force.

title: Shoplifters
simple_desc: On the margins of Tokyo, a dysfunctional band of outsiders are united by loyalty, a penchant for petty theft and playful grifting. When the young son is arrested, secrets are exposed that upend their tenuous, below-the-radar existence.

title: Dancer in the Dark
simple_desc: An Eastern European US immigrant with a love for musicals has to cope with the gradual loss of her vision.

title: Once Were Warriors
simple_desc: A family descended from Maori warriors is bedeviled by a violent father and the societal problems of being treated as outcasts.

title: Rope
simple_desc: Two men attempt to prove they committed the perfect crime by hosting a dinner party after strangling their former classmate to death.

title: The Killing
simple_desc: Crook Johnny Clay assembles a five-man team to plan and execute a daring racetrack robbery.

title: Mildred Pierce
simple_desc: A hard-working mother inches towards disaster as she divorces her husband and starts a successful restaurant business to support her spoiled daughter.

title: Strangers on a Train
simple_desc: A psychopath forces a tennis star to comply with his theory that two strangers can get away with murder.

title: Arsenic and Old Lace
simple_desc: A Brooklyn writer of books on the futility of marriage risks his reputation when he decides to tie the knot. Things get even more complicated when he learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are habitual murderers.

title: In Cold Blood
simple_desc: Two ex-cons murder a family in a robbery attempt, before going on the run from the authorities. The police try to piece together the details of the murder in an attempt to track down the killers.

title: The Thin Man
simple_desc: Former detective Nick Charles and his wealthy wife Nora investigate a murder case, mostly for the fun of it.

title: Ugly
simple_desc: The case of a missing girl takes us through a journey of human greed and brushes upon the egos and repressed emotions of the characters.

title: Elevator to the Gallows
simple_desc: A self-assured businessman murders his employer, the husband of his mistress, which unintentionally provokes an ill-fated chain of events.

title: 3-Iron
simple_desc: A transient young man breaks into empty homes to partake of the vacationing residents' lives for a few days.

title: Nine Queens
simple_desc: Two con artists try to swindle a stamp collector by selling him a sheet of counterfeit rare stamps (the "nine queens").

title: The Red Circle
simple_desc: After leaving prison, master thief Corey crosses paths with a notorious escapee and an alcoholic former policeman. The trio proceed to plot an elaborate heist.

title: The Big Heat
simple_desc: Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate.

title: Angels with Dirty Faces
simple_desc: A priest tries to stop a gangster from corrupting a group of street kids.

title: Baby
simple_desc: An elite counter-intelligence unit learns of a plot, masterminded by a maniacal madman. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to track the terrorists' international tentacles and prevent them from striking at the heart of India.

title: The Batman
simple_desc: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.

title: The Gentlemen
simple_desc: An American expat tries to sell off his highly profitable marijuana empire in London, triggering plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him.

title: The Irishman
simple_desc: An illustration of Frank Sheeran's life, from W.W.II veteran to hit-man for the Bufalino crime family and his alleged assassination of his close friend Jimmy Hoffa.

title: The Hateful Eight
simple_desc: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.
stars: ['Samuel L. Jackson', 'Kurt Russell', 'Jennifer Jason Leigh', 'Walton Goggins']

title: Nightcrawler
simple_desc: When Louis Bloom, a con man desperate for work, muscles into the world of L.A. crime journalism, he blurs the line between observer and participant to become the star of his own story.

title: American Gangster
simple_desc: An outcast New York City cop is charged with bringing down Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas, whose real life inspired this partly biographical film.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
simple_desc: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for 40 years by young computer hacker Lisbeth Salander.

title: A Bronx Tale
simple_desc: A father becomes worried when a local gangster befriends his son in the Bronx in the 1960s.

title: Taken
simple_desc: A retired CIA agent travels across Europe and relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been kidnapped while on a trip to Paris.

title: The Untouchables
simple_desc: During Prohibition, Treasury agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop ruthless Chicago gangster Al Capone, and assembles a small, incorruptible team to help him.
stars: ['Kevin Costner', 'Sean Connery', 'Robert De Niro', 'Charles Martin Smith']

title: The Fugitive
simple_desc: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt led by a seasoned U.S. Marshal.

title: Captain Phillips
simple_desc: The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the U.S.-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.

title: Boyz n the Hood
simple_desc: Follows the lives of three young males living in the Crenshaw ghetto of Los Angeles, dissecting questions of race, relationships, violence, and future prospects.
stars: ['Cuba Gooding Jr.', 'Laurence Fishburne', 'Hudhail Al-Amir', 'Lloyd Avery II']

title: Big Hero 6
simple_desc: A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who together team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

title: I Saw the Devil
simple_desc: A secret agent exacts revenge on a serial killer through a series of captures and releases.

title: The King of Comedy
simple_desc: Rupert Pupkin is a passionate yet unsuccessful comic who craves nothing more than to be in the spotlight and to achieve this, he stalks and kidnaps his idol to take the spotlight for himself.

title: Chor Nikal Ke Bhaga
simple_desc: A flight attendant and her business partner on a mission to steal diamonds and free themselves from the clutches of a loan shark.At 40,000 feet in the air, the heist goes horribly wrong and turns into a hostage situation.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
simple_desc: A journalist is aided by a young female hacker in his search for the killer of a woman who has been dead for forty years.

title: The Best Offer
simple_desc: A lonely art expert working for a mysterious and reclusive heiress finds not only her art worth examining.

title: Mississippi Burning
simple_desc: Two F.B.I. Agents with wildly different styles arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.

title: Changeling
simple_desc: Grief-stricken mother Christine Collins takes on the L.A.P.D. to her own detriment when they try to pass off an obvious impostor as her missing child.

title: Mother
simple_desc: A mother desperately searches for the killer who framed her son for a girl's horrific murder.

title: Gaslight
simple_desc: Ten years after her aunt was murdered in their London home, a woman returns from Italy in the 1880s to resume residence with her new husband. His obsessive interest in the home rises from a secret that may require driving his wife insane.

title: The Day of the Jackal
simple_desc: In the aftermath of France allowing Algeria's independence, a group of resentful military veterans hire a professional assassin codenamed "Jackal" to kill President Charles de Gaulle.

title: Once Upon a Time in Anatolia
simple_desc: A group of men set out in search of a dead body in the Anatolian steppes.

title: The Chaser
simple_desc: A disgraced ex-policeman who runs a small ring of prostitutes finds himself in a race against time when one of his women goes missing.

title: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
simple_desc: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.
directors: ['Eric Radomski', 'Kevin Altieri', 'Boyd Kirkland', 'Frank Paur', 'Dan Riba', 'Bruce Timm']

title: Gangubai Kathiawadi
simple_desc: Duped and sold to a brothel, a young woman fearlessly reclaims her power, using underworld connections to preside over the world she was once a pawn in.

title: Lilya 4-Ever
simple_desc: Sixteen-year-old Lilja and her only friend, the young boy Volodja, live in Russia, fantasizing about a better life. One day, Lilja falls in love with Andrej, who is going to Sweden, and invites Lilja to come along and start a new life.

title: A Prophet
simple_desc: A young Algerian man is sent to a French prison.

title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
simple_desc: A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up to the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.

title: The Asphalt Jungle
simple_desc: A major heist goes off as planned, but then double crosses, bad luck and solid police work cause everything to unravel.

title: The Killer
simple_desc: A disillusioned assassin accepts one last hit in hopes of using his earnings to restore vision to a singer he accidentally blinded.

title: Badla
simple_desc: A dynamic young entrepreneur finds herself locked in a hotel room with the corpse of her dead lover. She hires a prestigious lawyer to defend her and they work together to figure out what actually happened.

title: Knockin' on Heaven's Door
simple_desc: Two terminally ill patients escape from a hospital, steal a car and rush towards the sea.
stars: ['Til Schweiger', 'Jan Josef Liefers', 'Thierry van Werveke', 'Moritz Bleibtreu']

title: Ernest & Celestine
simple_desc: The story of an unlikely friendship between a bear, Ernest, and a young mouse named Celestine.

title: Ocean's Eleven
simple_desc: Danny Ocean and his ten accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.

title: Wind River
simple_desc: A wildlife officer, who is haunted by a tragedy that happened because of him, teams up with an FBI agent in solving a murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation and hopes to get redemption from his past regrets.

title: Zodiac
simple_desc: Between 1968 and 1983, a San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer, an unidentified individual who terrorizes Northern California with a killing spree.

title: 3:10 to Yuma
simple_desc: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

title: Primal Fear
simple_desc: An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and the truth is buried several layers deep.

title: Blue Velvet
simple_desc: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

title: Training Day
simple_desc: A rookie cop spends his first day as a Los Angeles narcotics officer with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears to be.

title: Man on Fire
simple_desc: In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

title: Crash
simple_desc: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
simple_desc: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
simple_desc: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them.

title: Road to Perdition
simple_desc: A mob enforcer's son in 1930s Illinois witnesses a murder, forcing him and his father to take to the road, and his father down a path of redemption and revenge.

title: Dirty Harry
simple_desc: When a man calling himself "the Scorpio Killer" menaces San Francisco, tough-as-nails Police Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is assigned to track down the crazed psychopath.

title: Serpico
simple_desc: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

title: Donnie Brasco
simple_desc: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life, at the expense of his regular one.

title: Glengarry Glen Ross
simple_desc: An examination of the machinations behind the scenes at a real estate office.

title: This Is England
simple_desc: A young boy becomes friends with a gang of skinheads. Friends soon become like family, and relationships will be pushed to the very limit.

title: Bonnie and Clyde
simple_desc: Bored waitress Bonnie Parker falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, stealing cars and robbing banks.

title: The French Connection
simple_desc: A pair of NYPD detectives in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a heroin smuggling ring based in Marseilles, but stopping them and capturing their leaders proves an elusive goal.

title: Lucky Number Slevin
simple_desc: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses. Under constant surveillance by Detective Brikowski and assassin Goodkat, he must get them before they get him.

title: Run Lola Run
simple_desc: After a botched money delivery, Lola has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks.

title: The Man from Nowhere
simple_desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hope of saving the child who is his only friend.

title: Miller's Crossing
simple_desc: Tom Reagan, an advisor to a Prohibition-era crime boss, tries to keep the peace between warring mobs but gets caught in divided loyalties.

title: Badlands
simple_desc: An impressionable teenage girl from a dead-end town, and her older greaser boyfriend, embark on a killing spree in the South Dakota Badlands.

title: Breathless
simple_desc: A small-time thief steals a car and impulsively murders a motorcycle policeman. Wanted by the authorities, he reunites with a hip American journalism student and attempts to persuade her to run away with him to Italy.

title: Key Largo
simple_desc: A man visits his war buddy's family hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.

title: Scarface
simple_desc: An ambitious and nearly insane violent gangster climbs the ladder of success in the mob, but his weaknesses prove to be his downfall.

title: Hard Boiled
simple_desc: A tough-as-nails cop teams up with an undercover agent to shut down a sinister mobster and his crew.

title: Down by Law
simple_desc: Two men are framed and sent to jail, where they meet a murderer who helps them escape and leave the state.

title: The Killers
simple_desc: Hit men kill an unresisting victim, and investigator Reardon uncovers his past involvement with beautiful, deadly Kitty Collins.

title: Adam's Apples
simple_desc: A neo-Nazi sentenced to community service at a church clashes with the blindly devoted minister.

title: Bad Day at Black Rock
simple_desc: A one-armed stranger comes to a tiny town possessing a terrible past they want to keep secret, by violent means if necessary.

title: Udta Punjab
simple_desc: A story that revolves around drug abuse in the affluent north Indian State of Punjab and how the youth there have succumbed to it en-masse resulting in a socio-economic decline.

title: American Psycho
simple_desc: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

title: Sicario
simple_desc: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.

title: Inside Man
simple_desc: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

title: The Godfather Part III
simple_desc: Follows Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, as he seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

title: Baby Driver
simple_desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver finds himself taking part in a heist doomed to fail.

title: Hell or High Water
simple_desc: Toby is a divorced father who's trying to make a better life. His brother is an ex-con with a short temper and a loose trigger finger. Together, they plan a series of heists against the bank that's about to foreclose on their family ranch.

title: West Side Story
simple_desc: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

title: Traffic
simple_desc: A conservative judge is appointed by the President to spearhead America's escalating war against drugs, only to discover that his teenage daughter is a crack addict. Two DEA agents protect an informant. A jailed drug baron's wife attempts to carry on the family business.

title: My Cousin Vinny
simple_desc: Two New Yorkers accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college call in the help of one of their cousins, a loudmouth lawyer with no trial experience.

title: RoboCop
simple_desc: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

title: Kick-Ass
simple_desc: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a superhero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.
stars: ['Aaron Taylor-Johnson', 'Nicolas Cage', 'Chloë Grace Moretz', 'Garrett M. Brown']

title: Falling Down
simple_desc: An ordinary man frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

title: Eastern Promises
simple_desc: A teenager who dies during childbirth leaves clues in her journal that could tie her child to a rape involving a violent Russian mob family.

title: Gone Baby Gone
simple_desc: Two Boston area detectives investigate a little girl's kidnapping, which ultimately turns into a crisis both professionally and personally.

title: After Hours
simple_desc: An ordinary word processor has the worst night of his life after he agrees to visit a girl in Soho he met that evening at a coffee shop.

title: Minority Report
simple_desc: In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.

title: Despicable Me
simple_desc: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.

title: 21 Grams
simple_desc: A freak accident brings together a critically ill mathematician, a grieving mother, and a born-again ex-con.

title: Lethal Weapon
simple_desc: Two newly paired cops who are complete opposites must put aside their differences in order to catch a gang of drug smugglers.

title: Lord of War
simple_desc: An arms dealer confronts the morality of his work as he is being chased by an INTERPOL Agent.

title: The Raid: Redemption
simple_desc: A S.W.A.T. team becomes trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs.

title: The Long Good Friday
simple_desc: An up-and-coming gangster is tested by the insurgence of an unknown, very powerful threat.

title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
simple_desc: Incompetent police Detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

title: Fallen Angels
simple_desc: This Hong Kong-set crime drama follows the lives of a hitman, hoping to get out of the business, and his elusive female partner.

title: End of Watch
simple_desc: Shot documentary-style, this film follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves.

title: Enter the Dragon
simple_desc: A Shaolin martial artist travels to an island fortress to spy on an opium lord - who is also a former monk from his temple - under the guise of attending a fighting tournament.

title: Just Mercy
simple_desc: World-renowned civil rights defense attorney Bryan Stevenson works to free a wrongly condemned death row prisoner.
stars: ['Michael B. Jordan', 'Jamie Foxx', 'Brie Larson', 'Charlie Pye Jr.']

title: Blood Simple
simple_desc: The owner of a seedy small-town Texas bar discovers that one of his employees is having an affair with his wife. A chaotic chain of misunderstandings, lies, and mischief ensues after he devises a plot to have them murdered.

title: Escape from Alcatraz
simple_desc: Alcatraz is the most secure prison of its time. It is believed that no one can ever escape from it, until three daring men make a possibly successful attempt at escaping from one of the most infamous prisons in the world.

title: Argentina, 1985
simple_desc: A team of lawyers takes on the heads of Argentina's bloody military dictatorship during the 1980s in a battle against odds and a race against time.

title: Freedom Writers
simple_desc: A young teacher inspires her class of at-risk students to learn tolerance, apply themselves and pursue education beyond high school.

title: Dead Man's Shoes
simple_desc: A disaffected soldier returns to his hometown to get even with the thugs who brutalized his mentally-challenged brother years ago.

title: Victoria
simple_desc: A young Spanish woman who has recently moved to Berlin finds her flirtation with a local guy turn potentially deadly as their night out with his friends reveals a dangerous secret.

title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three
simple_desc: Four armed men hijack a New York City subway car and demand a ransom for the passengers. The city's police are faced with a conundrum: Even if it's paid, how could they get away?

title: Leviathan
simple_desc: In a Russian coastal town, Kolya is forced to fight the corrupt mayor when he is told that his house will be demolished. He recruits a lawyer friend to help, but the man's arrival brings further misfortune for Kolya and his family.
